last_episode_to_air.name: Penance
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nina experiences the penance inflicted by her ownself for sin committed.

name: Love Crisis
overview: Weakening relationship of Ni​na and Armaan get into doldrums when a club entertainer...​Nimisha comes in the life of Armaan again. This precipitates N​ina to get in her original skin and she decides to avenge Armaan for breaking her trust as a result a devious plot is being devised by Ni​na​... will Armaan and ​Nimisha have to pay this cost with their lives?
